name: Gravity League
description:
Humanity have colonised Mars and taken the first steps to becoming an interplanetary species.
Unfortunately they have also brought greed and conflict with them into space.
Mega corporations vie over asteroid mining rights that spill over into open hostilities.
Space combat however is costly and not profitable so instead teams play for rights in zero-g sports arenas to show who has the greater space frame piloting skills and who will take home the spoils.

Features:
  • Made by the creators of Pierhead Arcade.
  • Up to 6 players online in virtual reality.
  • Single player challenge and practice modes.
  • Character customisation.
  • New modes added regularly.
  • Help develop the game through feedback and suggestions.
